name: Kalisetti Dheeraj Babu
title: Software Engineer
summary: I'm a passionate Software Engineer with more than 2 years of professional experience building scalable, low-latency backend systems and full-stack applications. My journey started with a strong foundation in Computer Science and Cybersecurity during my B.Tech, and now I'm pursuing an M.Sc. in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence from BITS Pilani. I specialize in creating production-grade systems that handle real-world scale — from real-time analytics platforms processing hundreds of gigabytes of data to user-friendly no-code tools. I love the full cycle: understanding the problem, designing clean architectures, writing solid code, optimizing performance, and making sure everything is secure and reliable. What truly drives me is building technology that solves meaningful problems and makes complex data accessible to non-technical users.
background_story: I grew up fascinated by how technology can solve real problems. During my B.Tech at K L University, I focused on Cyber Security, which gave me a deep appreciation for building secure systems from the ground up. After graduation, I started as a Cyber Security Trainee, then moved into full software development during my internship at Quotient Technologies. That experience taught me how to work on large enterprise systems. Today at Zinzu.io, I'm working on cutting-edge big data platforms. Along the way, I've also built several personal projects that combine my love for full-stack development and AI. Every step has reinforced my belief that great engineering is about both technical excellence and real user impact.
technical_philosophy: I believe in building systems that are scalable, maintainable, and secure by design. When I approach a new application, I start with understanding the data flow and user needs first. I prefer clean, modular code over quick hacks. I always think about performance early — choosing the right tools for distributed processing when dealing with large datasets, implementing proper caching, and setting up monitoring from day one. I enjoy the balance between rapid prototyping and production-grade engineering. Whether it's a simple REST API or a complex analytics pipeline, I focus on writing code that other developers can easily understand and extend.
full_stack_approach: I work comfortably across the full stack. On the frontend, I use React.js (and sometimes React Native for mobile) to create responsive, intuitive interfaces. On the backend, I prefer Django or FastAPI for their robustness and developer experience. I build RESTful APIs with proper authentication using OAuth2.0, and I make sure everything is well-documented and secure. For data-heavy applications, I integrate big data tools seamlessly into the backend. I also handle deployment, CI/CD, and cloud infrastructure myself, so I have end-to-end ownership of the applications I build.
cloud_journey: I've gained solid hands-on experience across all three major cloud platforms. With AWS, I work with EC2, S3, and Lambda for compute and storage. On GCP, I heavily use Dataproc, BigQuery, and Cloud Storage for data processing workloads. On Azure, I've worked with HDInsight, Synapse Analytics, Blob Storage, Cosmos DB, Load Balancers, and Service Principals. I enjoy designing multi-cloud architectures when needed and making sure applications are portable and cost-efficient.
big_data_expertise: Working with large-scale data is one of my favorite parts of the job. At Zinzu.io, I regularly handle 500GB+ datasets using Apache Spark and PySpark for distributed processing. I also use Hadoop for storage and orchestration, DuckDB for fast analytical queries, and Google BigQuery for serverless analytics. I've built pipelines for real-time analytics, anomaly detection, and behavioral analysis. I focus on optimizing query performance and making sure the systems can scale horizontally as data grows.
cybersecurity_influence: My cybersecurity background from university and early training has become a core part of how I engineer systems. I always think about security first — implementing proper encryption, secure authentication flows with OAuth2.0, API rate limiting, and threat detection mechanisms. It helps me build applications that are not only functional but also resilient against common attacks. I believe security should never be an afterthought.
skills: GCP (Dataproc, BigQuery, Cloud Storage, VMs, OAuth)
Azure (HDInsight, Synapse, Blob Storage, Cosmos DB, Load Balancer, Service Principals)

experience.description: At Zinzu.io, I'm building a next-generation no-code big data analytics platform from the ground up. My responsibilities include designing scalable REST APIs and backend services that process massive real-time datasets. I developed the full-stack application using React.js for the frontend and Django for the backend, with secure OAuth2.0 authentication and session management. I implemented GA4 analytics, anomaly detection systems, and behavior flow visualization tools that increased user engagement by 25%. On the data engineering side, I optimized distributed processing using Apache Spark, PySpark, Hadoop, BigQuery, and DuckDB, cutting query times by 30%. I also manage multi-cloud infrastructure across AWS, GCP, and Azure, handling Docker deployments, CI/CD pipelines, logging, and monitoring to maintain 99.9% uptime in production.

During my 18-month internship at Quotient Technologies, I worked on enterprise-grade backend systems. I contributed to performance improvements, scalability enhancements, and large-scale data migrations. Key projects included ALC Offer Migration, Tiered Pinning, and migrating workflows to Airflow. I introduced better debugging practices and root-cause analysis methods that reduced average issue resolution time by 35%. This role taught me how to work in fast-paced, collaborative environments and deliver reliable software at scale.

My first professional exposure was in cybersecurity. I learned network log analysis, vulnerability scanning, and basic penetration testing techniques. This short but intense training helped me develop a security-first mindset that I still apply in every project I work on today.

projects.name: AIHub - Multi-AI Chat Platform
projects.description: AIHub is currently my favorite and most proud project. I built a unified conversational platform that brings together Grok, DeepSeek, Claude, and ChatGPT in one beautiful interface. The biggest challenge was handling concurrent users efficiently while keeping sessions persistent. I used React for the frontend and FastAPI for the backend, added local storage for offline continuity, and made sure the UI was fully responsive. It was a great learning experience in integrating multiple AI APIs and building a delightful user experience.

projects.name: Real Estate Platform
projects.description: For a freelance client, I created a complete web and mobile solution for property management. The platform allows agents to list properties, track leads, and manage follow-ups in one place. I built the backend with Django REST Framework, the web frontend in React, and the mobile app using React Native with Expo Go. The system improved agent productivity by around 60% according to the client. It was my first major full-stack freelance project and taught me a lot about real client requirements and delivery under deadlines.

education.degree: M.Sc. in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
education.specialization: I'm currently deepening my knowledge in machine learning, large-scale data processing, AI system design, and intelligent applications. This program is helping me connect my practical engineering experience with advanced theoretical concepts.

Cyber Security — CGPA: 8.48. During my bachelor's, I focused heavily on secure software development, network security, and ethical hacking. These foundations continue to influence how I approach system architecture and data protection today.

certifications: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate — helped me understand cloud architecture patterns deeply
Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals — gave me a strong base in Azure services
Juniper Networks Certified Associate (JNCIA) — strengthened my networking and infrastructure knowledge
proud_moments: I'm especially proud of reducing query latency by 30% at Zinzu.io and seeing user engagement go up 25% after launching new analytics features. On the personal side, successfully delivering the Real Estate Platform that made a real difference for the client's business was very satisfying. Every time a user finds my AIHub platform useful, it reminds me why I love this work.
motivations: What keeps me excited is the constant learning and the ability to create things that matter. I enjoy the intellectual challenge of distributed systems and big data, but I get the most joy when I see non-technical users successfully using powerful tools I helped build. I thrive in environments where I can collaborate with smart people, experiment with new technologies, and continuously improve both the product and myself.
open_to: I'm actively open to new opportunities in 2026 and beyond — especially roles involving full-stack development, backend engineering, big data platforms, cloud architecture, or AI-powered applications. I'm willing to relocate anywhere in India or abroad. I prefer teams that value quality code, innovation, work-life balance, and continuous learning. Whether it's a startup building something disruptive or a larger organization solving complex problems at scale, I'm excited to contribute and grow.
